select
t.id, u.name as owner, t.money, t.name, t.expectedDate, c.name as customerId, t.stage, t.type, t.source, t.activityId, con.fullname as contactsId, t.createBy, t.createTime, t.editBy, t.editTime, t.description, t.contactSummary, t.nextContactTime
from tbl_tran t join tbl_customer c on t.customerId=c.id join tbl_user u on t.owner=u.id join tbl_contacts con on t.contactsId=con.id
